title: President expresses grief over Dr Mandhroâ€™s death
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 11 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Saturday expressed his deep grief over the death of PPP Senator Dr Sikandar Ali Mandhro.
In his condolence message, the president expressed sympathy with the bereaved family.
He prayed for the high ranks of the departed soul and for the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
